00053 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlFileToXml::perform(){

00082 TiXmlDocument* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlFileToXml::getXmlDocument(){
00083   if (!doc)
00084     LOGW("Returning a NULL xml document");
00085 
00086   return doc;
00087 }

00097 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlFileToXml::fileToxml(){
00098   if (writeToFile()){
00099     doc=new TiXmlDocument( "curlget.xml" );
00100     if(doc->LoadFile()){
00101       return true;
00102     }
00103     else{
00104       LOGW("An error occured while loading curlget.xml");
00105       return false;
00106     }
00107   }
00108   else{
00109     LOGW("The writeToFile operation failed");
00110     return false;
00111   }
00112 }
